snippet.title: BATMAN - The Telltale Series: Episode 5 - City of Light Trailer | PS4, PS3
snippet.description:
With threats mounting around every corner, The Dark Knight’s identity and those closest to him are caught in the crossfires of vengeance. Which mask you choose in your fight for justice – Bruce Wayne or Batman – will determine the fate of Gotham.

Batman – The Telltale Series Episode 5: ‘City of Light’ arrives starting December 13th !

https://www.telltalegames.com/batman/     

Rated Mature: Violence, Blood, Sexual Themes, Language
